patthana15.78:4.1: Saraṇaṃ dassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo nadassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.78:4.2: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ … pe … sahajāte tīṇi … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana15.78:5.1: Saraṇaṃ bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.78:5.2: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ … pe … sahajāte tīṇi … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana15.78:6.1: Araṇaṃ nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naaraṇo nanevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
